Title: Prohibits rules or regulations of the state police prohibiting members from modifying or recommending the modification of certain charges before a court
Summary: Establishes the division of state police shall make no rule or regulation prohibiting members of the state police from modifying or recommending the modification of a charge before a court in certain cases related to violations of the vehicle and traffic law.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to prohibiting certain plea bargain limitations
